message:
The TSA's naked body scanners have once again failed to detect a concealed handgun that was taken through security lines at Dallas Fort Worth International Airport multiple times in covert tests.

"The TSA’s naked body scanners have once again failed to detect a concealed handgun that was taken through security lines at DFW International Airport multiple times in covert tests. A female TSA worker had concealed a pistol in her bra as she walked through the radiation firing body scanners, yet no agents stopped her even once despite walking the gun through 'many times'..."

http://www.prisonplanet.com/tsa-scanners-repeatedly-fail-to-detect-handguns-in-testing.html
